alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Dawson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 06 at 10:23PM CDT until June 06 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CDT FOR WESTERN BUFFALO AND EASTERN DAWSON COUNTIES... At 1023 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Eddyville, or 17 miles north of Lexington, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Eddyville around 1030 PM CDT. Sumner around 1040 PM CDT. Miller around 1050 PM CDT. Elm Creek and Amherst around 1100 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 238 and 267. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
